summary.span: 提供一种控件，该控件以连续滚动模式查看流内容。

span.span: Provides a control for viewing flow content in a continuous scrolling mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以连续滚动模式显示内容。 shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 的类似控件以一次一页的查看模式显示内容。A similar control, , shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 和 都固定到特定的查看模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 另一方面， 包括允许用户在各种查看模式（由 枚举提供）之间进行动态选择的功能，但代价是比 或 更高的权重。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being heavier weight than or . 下图显示了默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 控件。The following figure shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![屏幕快照：基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "屏幕截图：基本 FlowDocumentScrollViewer")![Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-main.png "Screenshot: Basic FlowDocumentScrollViewer") 默认情况下，总是显示垂直滚动条，而水平滚动条则在需要时显示。By default, a vertical scrollbar is always shown, and a horizontal scrollbar becomes visible if needed. 的默认 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 不包括工具栏;但 属性可用于启用内置工具栏。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for does not include a toolbar; however, the property can be used to enable a built-in toolbar. 是 唯一允许的子元素。 is the only allowable child element for a . 元素可以承载的 不能超过一个。A element may host no more than one . ## Examples 下面的示例定义了上图中所示的 。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentScrollViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentscrollviewerxaml)]

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Ctrl + F 提供用于切换 "**查找**" 对话框的键盘快捷键。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的 上的 "**查找**" 对话框。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "屏幕截图：FlowDocumentScrollViewer 查找对话框")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog](~/add/media/flowdocscrollviewer-find.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentScrollViewer find dialog") 默认的 "**查找**" 对话框包括用于输入搜索文本的字段，以及 "**查找下一个**"、"**查找上一个**" 和 "**选项**" 按钮。The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 默认情况下提供下列**查找**选项：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字匹配Match whole word only - 区分大小写Match case - 匹配音调符号Match diacritic - 匹配 kashidaMatch kashida - 匹配 alef hamzaMatch alef hamza

span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: 每当未处理的 路由事件在其路由中到达此类时调用。

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法，则仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的有些类似于 \* 方法上 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] 事件模式：它提供了用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下，匹配事件是路由事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件，On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的，因为路由事件可能是由子元素（而不是将调用处理程序的元素）引发的，因此，您的实现需要将事件参数的源属性考虑（并且在大多数情况下不应尝试重新引发事件）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 当沿路由收到事件时， 的子类可以选择调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种可能的情况是采用事件的参数，并特意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

summary.span: 调用标准的“打印”对话框，此对话框可用于打印 的内容和配置打印首选项。

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 不提供 "**打印**" 按钮。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] does not provide a **Print** button. 下图显示了标准**打印**对话框的示例。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 请注意，"**打印**" 对话框的特定外观可能因宿主计算机的配置而异。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![屏幕快照： "打印" 对话框](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "屏幕截图：“打印”对话框")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 设置为0，则 是透明的，并且不可见。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果将 设置为1.0，则 是不透明的，并且所选文本将不可见。If you set the to 1.0, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，将 属性设置为粉红色，并将 属性设置为0.7。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. summary.span: 获取或设置当前缩放级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level.

value.span: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 100.0（缩放级别为 100%）。

span.span: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放级别受 和 属性的值的约束。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute. span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 当前缩放增量，以百分比表示。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量是指在执行 或 命令时增加或减少 级别的百分比。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 特性。The following example shows how to set the attribute.
